title: December: Building the Kingdom of God in the Latter Days
short_title: December: Building the Kingdom of God in the Latter Days
content: December: Building the Kingdom of God in the Latter Days
“May the kingdom of God go forth, that the kingdom of heaven may come” (

The Aaronic Priesthood holders in your quorum were sent to the earth at this specific time to help prepare the world for the Second Coming of the Savior. They have special gifts and talents that the Lord wants them to use to help build His kingdom and share His gospel. The lessons in this unit will help them develop those gifts as they prepare to become leaders and teachers in the Church and kingdom of God.
To make Duty to God part of the Sunday quorum meeting, you may consider teaching the Duty to God outline below during this unit.
Outlines to choose from this month:
How can I be a missionary now? (Duty to God)
How can I become a better home teacher?
How does Heavenly Father want me to use my spiritual gifts?
How can I prepare to establish a Christ-centered home?
What can I do to help new members of the Church?
How can I help my less-active friends return to church?

Many of the lesson topics and learning activities in this unit would work well as Mutual activities. Work with quorum presidencies in selecting and planning appropriate activities to reinforce what the young men learn on Sunday.
